description: at the end of the Data Cascade you may want to inject Data properties into your data object that are based on other data values. To do that you can use the new eleventyComputed feature.
locally assigned front matter values override things further up the layout chain.
specific files of Json or JavaScript data that are paired by name with specific pages.
shared between multiple pages in a specific directory in your project.
helpful for creating template inheritance features to show different data on each section based on the layout.
use the configuration API to add global data to your templates.
JavaScript or Json files stored by default in the src directory of your project.
